user_query: I'm organizing a charity event and I need some sponsors. Can you provide me with the latest and trending coupons from 27coupons? Additionally, fetch all the available coupons from the coupons API to find potential sponsors who offer discounts and deals.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest and trending coupons from 27coupons to identify potential sponsors.
Retrieve all available coupons from the coupons API to find additional potential sponsors offering discounts and deals.
Analyze the fetched coupons from both sources to identify suitable sponsors for the charity event.
